comment: "-meric" - a combining form meaning “part,” “segment,” “unit,” used esp. in terms describing structures or divisions of a cell.  I.e. multipart

Thank you, professor Barbara Imperiali <3

(On Sunday of February 5, 2023).  Cell Signaling and the Molecular Mechanisms therein (Ligand-Receptor Binding): 1)  Previous topic of Protein Folding where Ultimately all of the Aspects are Defined by the Genomic sequence but Post-Translational Misfolding can happen pathologically (Prion's Disease is perhaps the most Severe and miscomprehended Proteomics in the Universe); Chaperone Proteins (outside original use of the word) assist in the Folding of the Protein; They also mediate Hydrophobicity in certain Areas of High Hydrophobic Sequencing Sectors of the developing Protein Sequence (polypeptides of Hydrophobic Regions)and thereby conferring Protein Protection (Clumping Proteins and Premature Degradation by Default); 2) Proteosome (Anti-Ribosome Activity or Rather the Degradation of Proteins Locus (Organelles of the Ribosome Type; 2k kDa); 3) Ubiquitin Protein (76 AA Polypeptide or Actual Protein) is Specific to the Degradation of Misfolded (Old and Affected Proteins) and is Responsible of the Ubiquitination (Chemical Reaction) of Proteins (8.5 kDa), an Enzymatic Reaction Requiring ATP Solvency; 4) G-Protein Coupled Rectors (GCPR); 2) Receptor Tyrosine Kinase (RTK); 3) Ion Channels;   By PhD Barbara Imperiali.  Heil!
